errors.error_description: The `git commit` command in the 'Contributing' section is syntactically incorrect because it is missing the `-m` flag to specify the commit message.
correction_candidates: Commit your changes (```git commit -am 'Added some feature'```)
Commit your changes (```git commit -m 'Added some feature'```)
Commit your changes (```git commit --message 'Added some feature'```)
Commit your changes (```git commit -a -m 'Added some feature'```)
errors.golden_answer: Commit your changes (```git commit -am 'Added some feature'```)

errors.error_description: The path to the test directory is specified as `tests/`, but the correct path is `rollbar/test`.
correction_candidates: Tests are in `rollbar/test`. To run the tests: `python setup.py test`
errors.golden_answer: Tests are in `rollbar/test`. To run the tests: `python setup.py test`
